name: AffiliateTraction UK
tag_list: affiliate-marketing-programme, affiliate-management, affiliate-programmes, affiliate-marketing, affiliate-agency, outsourced-affiliate-management, affiliate-marketing-agency, affiliate-manager
overview: AffiliateTraction is a UK based affiliate marketing agency that provides affiliate programme management and marketing services for top online retailers. AffiliateTraction services include placement in multiple affiliate networks, powerful brand oversight, product datafeed management and creative design. For over a decade we have built our systems to eliminate frustrations and obstacles for our clients while reducing costs, creating a service of unparalleled efficiency and value to online merchants.

milestones.description: The world's largest performance marketing agency AffiliateTraction has expanded its global long term relationship with Affiliate Window, announcing that its newly-opened London office will be working with the leading performance network here in the UK.
milestones.source_description: AffiliateTraction UK teams up with Affiliate Window for strategic performance marketing campaign management

milestones.description: AffiliateTraction UK has announced the initial team line-up for its new London office, who together already have over 25 years experience in the Performance Marketing industry.
milestones.source_description: AffiliateTraction UK Announces Launch Team Line-Up

milestones.description: AffiliateTraction today announces its integration with Webgains to finally enable publishers to drive sales directly from Social Media, and in turn allow advertiser clients to track sales via the channel without a tracking link.
milestones.source_description: AffiliateTraction Teams With Webgains to Fully Monetise Social's Word of Mouth Sales Potential
